lead_paragraph: MUELLER--Suzanne C. The Trustees and staff of The New York Public Library deeply mourn the passing of Suzanne C. Mueller, a devoted and beloved member of the Library family. A dedicated Library Trustee for more than three decades, she was a founding co-chairman and longstanding honorary chairman of the Library's Conservators Program, home to a generous group of Library donors established in 1979. A strong advocate and active fundraiser for the Library, she and her husband Carl were also generous Library supporters themselves. We offer our deep sympathies to Carl and all of her family and friends. Evan R. Chesler, Chairman; Samuel C. Butler, Catherine Marron, Elizabeth Rohatyn, Marshall Rose, Neil L. Rudenstine, Chairmen Emeriti; Anthony W. Marx, President 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MUELLER, SUZANNE C
